name: Remove all attachments
author: Dubbo Feng

sections.description: When you have a lot of attachments in a post or page, it is pain to delete them one by one. This plugin will add a \”remove all attachments\” button to add/edit post page in media buttons area. It is an additional function for attachments plugin. It will remove all attachments for current post or page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the remove-all-attachments folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using the shortcodes in your content or functions in your theme

short_description: Add a remove all attachments button to media buttons area.
description: When you have a lot of attachments in a post or page, it is pain to delete them one by one. This plugin will add a \”remove all attachments\” button to add/edit post page in media buttons area. It is an additional function for attachments plugin. It will remove all attachments for current post or page.
